sample.title: Study Group Recruitment
sample.content:
Hello! We're starting a new study group.

We plan to meet every Saturday at 2 PM at a cafe near Gangnam Station. We're looking for people who want to grow together.

If you're interested, please let us know in the comments!
sample.author: Study Leader
sample.comment1: I'm interested! I'd like to participate
sample.comment2: I'd also like to join. What topic will the study focus on?
sample.comment3: Great opportunity! I really want to participate
